defect: Rear axle mounting points may corrode, potentially leading to axle detachment
remedy: Inspection and replacement of rear axle if corrosion found

defect: Blower motor resistor may overheat, risk of fire in dashboard area
remedy: Replace blower motor resistor and related wiring

defect: Seatbelt pretensioner may not deploy correctly in a collision
remedy: Software update and seatbelt pretensioner inspection

defect: Door latch may not engage properly, door could open while driving
remedy: Replace door latch mechanism on all four doors

defect: Fuel tank ventilation valve may crack, causing fuel vapour leak
remedy: Replace fuel tank ventilation valve

defect: PHEV battery cells may overheat, risk of thermal event during charging
remedy: Software update and battery inspection

defect: Airbag control unit software may prevent airbag deployment in certain collision scenarios
remedy: Software update to airbag control unit

defect: Rear seatbelt buckle may not latch correctly
remedy: Replace rear seatbelt buckle assemblies

defect: Fuel pump flange may leak, potential fuel smell or dripping
remedy: Replace fuel pump flange gasket

defect: EGR cooler may develop a crack, causing coolant leak
remedy: Replace EGR cooler module

defect: Seatbelt anchor bolt may not be tightened to correct torque specification
remedy: Check and re-torque seatbelt anchor bolts

defect: Incorrect valve spring may cause engine misfire or stalling
remedy: Replace valve springs in affected engines

defect: Rear suspension lower arm bolt may loosen over time
remedy: Inspect and re-torque rear suspension lower arm bolts

defect: Communication module software may cause incorrect eCall (emergency call) location data
remedy: Software update to communication module

defect: Steering column coupling bolt may not be properly tightened
remedy: Inspect and re-torque steering column coupling bolt

defect: Rear windscreen wiper motor bracket may crack in cold weather
remedy: Replace rear windscreen wiper motor bracket

defect: Front passenger airbag may not deploy correctly due to sensor error
remedy: Replace front passenger airbag sensor and software update

defect: e-POWER hybrid system inverter may malfunction, causing loss of drive
remedy: Replace inverter unit and update control software

defect: Brake caliper mounting bolt may loosen, reducing braking effectiveness
remedy: Inspect and re-torque brake caliper mounting bolts

defect: Parking brake may not fully engage on steep inclines
remedy: Software update to electronic parking brake module

defect: Seatbelt warning system may not function correctly for rear passengers
remedy: Software update to body control module

defect: Rear view camera image may freeze in cold conditions
remedy: Software update to rear camera module

defect: High-voltage battery relay may malfunction, causing drive system shutdown
remedy: Replace high-voltage battery relay and update BMS software

defect: Steering column universal joint may corrode, affecting steering feel
remedy: Inspect and replace steering column universal joint if corroded

defect: AdBlue heater may fail, triggering engine management warning and reduced power
remedy: Replace AdBlue heating element

defect: Windscreen bonding adhesive may not meet specification, windscreen could detach in collision
remedy: Inspect and re-bond windscreen if necessary

defect: Airbag control unit software may prevent correct airbag deployment timing
remedy: Software update to airbag control unit

defect: Hood latch secondary catch may not engage, hood could open while driving
remedy: Adjust and lubricate hood latch mechanism

defect: Fuel pump impeller may deform, causing engine stalling or failure to start
remedy: Replace fuel pump assembly

defect: ASDM (Active Safety Domain Master) software may prevent autonomous emergency braking
remedy: Software update to ASDM module

defect: Front seatbelt pretensioner connector may corrode in humid conditions
remedy: Inspect and replace front seatbelt pretensioner connectors

defect: 9-speed automatic gearbox may unexpectedly shift to neutral
remedy: Software update to transmission control module

defect: Rear trailing arm bush may separate from bracket under extreme load
remedy: Inspect and replace rear trailing arm bush if worn

defect: Hood latch bolt may be under-torqued, hood could open at speed
remedy: Inspect and re-torque hood latch bolts

defect: Suspension lower arm fastener may loosen due to incorrect coating
remedy: Replace lower arm fasteners with updated specification

defect: Front wheel hub bearing may fail prematurely, causing wheel vibration
remedy: Replace front wheel hub bearings

defect: Driver airbag inflator may rupture during deployment (Takata recall)
remedy: Replace driver airbag module

defect: Engine timing chain may stretch, causing engine rattle or failure
remedy: Replace timing chain, tensioner and guides

defect: Airbag control unit software may prevent correct airbag deployment timing
remedy: Software update to airbag control unit

defect: Rear seatbelt may not retract correctly after use
remedy: Replace rear seatbelt retractor mechanisms

defect: Passenger airbag may not deploy due to connector fault
remedy: Replace passenger airbag connector

defect: Battery positive cable may chafe against body structure, causing short circuit
remedy: Inspect and reroute battery positive cable with additional protection

defect: Rear suspension crossmember bolts may not be correctly tightened
remedy: Inspect and re-torque rear suspension crossmember bolts

defect: Rear axle toe link ball joint may fail, affecting vehicle stability
remedy: Replace rear axle toe links

defect: DSG gearbox mechatronic unit software may cause unexpected gear engagement
remedy: Software update to DSG gearbox mechatronic unit

defect: PCV (Positive Crankcase Ventilation) valve may fail, causing oil consumption
remedy: Replace PCV valve assembly
